text: had a great haircut by sunny chee!! she was extremely attentive to my requests and was very bubbly and made sure i felt comfortable during the cut! would definitely recommend anyone looking for a haircut to come here!!

Sunny Chee has consistently been my preferred hairstylist, embodying gold-class excellence. Her exceptional customer focus and keen understanding of clients' needs set her apart. Singapore would benefit greatly from more service providers who prioritize customer-centric care to this degree.
Nice place for a haircut. Was served by Sunny Chee and she was professional and friendly. She even suggested a suitable hairstyle that turned out pretty good ðŸ’¯

Had my hair cut earlier today at Lot One by hairstylist May Chua. Had to get a haircut urgently before flying off and decided give Kcut a try as it is conveniently located at a mall near me. May Chua was friendly, techniques were superb and recommended me hairstyles that would suit me and gave me a really good overall first experience. Extremely worth the value as well. Would be back to patronize again!
